data.message: What is the purpose of messenger?

replies.message: Thanks for your question, Liz. Messenger is a better messaging experience—with added speed and new features¬ like the groups tab, the ability to make voice calls and easy new ways to take send photos and videos within the app. Plus, it links seamlessly with the Facebook app to make switching between the two quick and easy! Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1erXhKt -Chantal
Messenger made it harder to contact my friends because none of them have it or want it!
Yes let us have it our way like Burger King I like the old way
Yeah.  It's supposed to be "faster" but I don't see how considering I have to wait for my phone to switch apps??? It's a waste of space.  There should at least be an option to not use it.
@facebook messenger is a mess don't like it
the main purpose is wash Daisy :-)
